headline: Introducing Zero Round Trip Time Resumption (0-RTT)

description: Cloudflareâ€™s mission is to help build a faster and more secure Internet. Over the last several years, the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) has been working on a new version of TLS, the protocol that powers the secure web.
